headers.value: default-src 'self'; script-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline' https://cdn.tailwindcss.com https://cdn.jsdelivr.net https://esm.sh; style-src 'self' 'unsafe-inline'; img-src 'self' data: https://source.unsplash.com; connect-src 'self' https://generativelanguage.googleapis.com; font-src 'self'; object-src 'none'; frame-ancestors 'none'; base-uri 'self';
